# delegate

**Instance Property**

The store view controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any SKStoreProductViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Your application must set the delegate before presenting the store view controller.

## Related Documentation

- **In-App Purchase Programming Guide**

## Setting a delegate

- **SKStoreProductViewControllerDelegate**: A protocol to call when the customer dismisses the store screen.
